fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Cast a spell each night.
- Create a Horcrux. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The spell must be from an official source of Harry Potter lore.
- The Host decides what the spell does when cast.
- Once you cast a specific spell you cannot cast that spell again for 2 nights.
- Once you create a horcrux, the next time you die you will come back to life, this information will not be made public.
